description: Defines accessors for 'player_stats' and 'leaderboards' MongoDB collections, facilitating database interactions related to player statistics and leaderboards in a multiplayer Ludo game project.

methods.name: playerStatsCollection
methods.description: Returns the 'player_stats' collection from the database.

methods.name: leaderboardsCollection
methods.description: Returns the 'leaderboards' collection from the database.
